description: '''Chutney parang''' or '''parang chutney''' is a style of music that is a cross between [[Venezuela]], [[Colombia]], and [[Trinidad and Tobago]]'s traditional [[Christmas music]], [[Parang (folk music)|parang]] and [[Indo-Trinidadian]] [[chutney music]]. It is sung in [[Trinidadian and Tobagonian English|English]], [[Caribbean Hindustani|Hindustani]], and [[Spanish language|Spanish]].
